instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3435: What is 820-3435? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.820-3535: What is 820-3535? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3435</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> occasionally restarts by itself
threads.message: Have got an <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3535</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> ... was has a bit of liquid , however it?s been cleaned out . It works not but would occasionally restart by itself, have replaced the keyboard but it?s still restarts, and the time between its restarts varies

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3435</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> occasionally restarts by itself
threads.message: Since you are dealing with liquid damage there is probably some pad eaten under a component such as a resistor or a IC.  This one will be a hard one due to the intermittent nature of the problem.  I recommend removal of the board and crawling over it with a microscope and a probe checking to see if resistors and parts in the damaged areas are securely attached.   Also chips that have water damage on them I would pull to inspect pads.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3435</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> occasionally restarts by itself
threads.message:
Maybe need to reball SMC.

You can also heat CPU with good flux; just burn eventually crap accumulated underneath.
Finish with ultrasonic cleaner; be carefull, if no sweep option available.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3435</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> occasionally restarts by itself
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3435</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> occasionally restarts by itself
threads.message: the issue was the Trackpad, thank you so much guys .
